title.rendered: Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi: Net Worth 2023, Career Earnings

content.rendered:
Summary

  • About Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi
    • Early Career
    • Professional Career
  • Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi’s Net Worth in 2023
    • Career Earnings
  • Personal Details
    • Husband
    • How Old is Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi?
    • What is her nationality?
    • Career Highlights
    • FAQs About Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi 

Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi is an American professional rodeo cowgirl who specializes in barrel racing. She is a two-time Women’s Professional Rodeo Association (WPRA) Barrel Racing World Champion, having won the championship in December 2007 and 2009.

Here you can follow Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi’s net worth, career earnings, career highlights, personal details, husband, and more.

About Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi

Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi was born on February 9, 1984, in Victoria, Texas. She currently resides in Lampasas, Texas.

Early Career

Brittany’s passion for rodeo and barrel racing was evident from a young age. She made her mark in the sport early on by winning the National High School Rodeo championship in 2002.

She joined the Women’s Professional Rodeo Association (WPRA) the following year in 2003.

Professional Career

Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi’s professional career is marked by significant achievements and accolades. She is a two-time Women’s Professional Rodeo Association (WPRA) Barrel Racing World Champion, having won the championship in 2007 and 2009.

Her exceptional skills and dedication to the sport have also led her to qualify for the prestigious Wrangler National Finals Rodeo 17 times.

In addition to her championship wins, Pozzi Tonozzi has had several notable performances throughout her career. For instance, she won the California Rodeo Salinas for the fifth time in her career.

In 2023, she won her first Gold Medal at the Utah Days of ’47 Rodeo. This victory was particularly significant as it helped her cross the $3 million mark in WPRA career earnings.

Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi’s Net Worth in 2023

As of 2023, Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi’s net worth is estimated to be $4 million.

Her net worth is primarily derived from her winnings in various competitions and businesses.

Career Earnings

Brittany Pozzi has had significant earnings throughout her career. In 2023, she crossed the $3 million mark in WPRA career earnings.

In 2023, she set a new regular season earnings record with $270,563, surpassing the old record of $250,378 set by Tiany Schuster in 2017. This achievement was marked by her first Gold Medal win at the Utah Days of ’47 Rodeo, which helped her cross the $3 million mark in WPRA career earnings.

In addition to her regular-season earnings, Pozzi Tonozzi has had several notable performances that contributed to her career earnings. For instance, her Gold Medal performance in Salt Lake City earned her $34,559.

In previous years, Pozzi Tonozzi also had substantial earnings. In 2019, she earned $105,503 and came in 5th in the World Standings. She placed 12th in the World Standings and had an annual earnings of $113,156, in 2013.

Personal Details

Husband

Brittany is married to Garrett Tonozzi. The couple lives in Lampasas, Texas, where they have a horse breeding business.

How Old is Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi?

As of November 27, 2023, Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi is 39 years old.

What is her nationality?

She is American.

Career Highlights

  • World Titles: 2 (2007, 2009)
  • Wrangler NFR Average Titles: 2 (2006-07)
  • Wrangler NFR Qualifications: 15 (2003, 2005-13, 2017-21)
  • RNCFR Titles: 2 (2012-13)
  • Tour Finale Titles: 4

FAQs About Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi 

What is Brittany Tozzi Ponozzi’s net worth?

Her estimated net worth is $4 million.

When and where was she born?

Brittany was born on February 9, 1984, in Victoria, Texas.

Who is her husband?

Garrett Tonozzi.
